name: Cube Invaders 32
description:
** CUBE INVADERS 32 **

Use Tetraminos to defeat the Invaders from the Space!


** HOW TO PLAY **

Rotate: UP

Move Left: LEFT

Move Right: RIGHT

Move Down: DOWN

Free Fall: SPACE
